title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: The bug occurs when using the new Date('3/2/2005') value in a table filter. When saving and previewing the report, there are errors on the report page.
OB: There are errors on the report page when using the new Date('3/2/2005') value in a table filter. The errors occur in Table: table8. The error message is 'data.engine.DataConversionError'.
EB: When using the new Date('3/2/2005') value in a table filter and saving and previewing the report, the filter should work without errors. There should not be any error messages related to data conversion.
SR:
To reproduce the bug: 
1. Open the report containing the table with a filter. 
2. Set the filter value to 'new Date('3/2/2005')'. 
3. Save and preview the report. 
4. Observe the errors on the report page related to data conversion in Table: table8.
